  • ComponentWrapper

Class ComponentWrapper<SCHEMA, SYSTEM>

Extend this class to create strongly typed A-Frame components. Default implementations for component lifecycle methods such as init(), tick(), and others are provided, and can be overridden for your component's specific behavior.

Type parameters

  • SCHEMA

  • SYSTEM: System

Hierarchy

  • ComponentWrapper
